pages.heading: Repairing Salve
pages.text: Repairs damaged tools by 1 point when tool is used. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords.$(br2)Applies: Regular Maintenance I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Repairing Salve L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Regular Maintenance I (1024 blocks)

pages.heading: Repairing Salve II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment repairs the tool by 2 points for every point of damage taken. Does not activate if doing so would waste some of the repair bonus. $(br2)Applies: Regular Maintenance II (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Repairing Salve XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Regular Maintenance I (4096 blocks)

pages.heading: Repairing Salve III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment repairs the tool by 3 points for every point of damage taken. Does not activate if doing so would waste some of the repair bonus. $(br2)Applies: Regular Maintenance III (256 blocks)
